post.text: For 30 years, Hillary Clinton has done NOTHING but deliver terrible policies that have made us less safe and less prosperous -- what a failure! As President, I promise to always put the American people FIRST. On day one, believe me, you will see the REAL CHANGE our country needs to win again! #ImWithYou

comment.author: Breanna
comment.text: Theyre going to drop a fraud bomb, and announce Clinton to be a victor even tho she doesnt have any significant level of support throughout this entire campaign. Youll see.

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: All we can do is vote and pray.
